danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.description: This action is irreversible. Deleting your account will remove all your data.
danger.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
danger.success: Your account has been successfully deleted.
danger.error: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again later.

login.title: Admin Login
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access the admin dashboard
login.error: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

stats.exportTitle: Export statistics and history to PDF

mushroomPopup.uploadError: Something went wrong during image upload.

submit.title: Submit your mushroom inquiry
submit.referenceHint: Use this code to find your submission later:
submit.thankYouHint: You'll receive a reply as soon as an expert has reviewed your images.

steps.title: Click the purple button below to add the first mushroom
steps.hint: Take one photo from the top, one from the side, and one from underneath. Good lighting and a neutral background help the identification.

steps.title: Remember the reference code after submission
steps.hint: You‚Äôll receive a reference code when you submit. Use this code to check your results later.

steps.title: Our experts will review your photos
steps.hint: You'll get a response within 1‚Äì2 days. Use the reference code to check back.

stepDescription.top: Picture from the top of the mushroom
stepDescription.side: Picture from the side of the mushroom
stepDescription.under: Picture from the bottom of the mushroom

validation.errorMushroomMissing: You must add at least one mushroom before submitting.

tooltips.completeRequest: Mark this request as finished and reviewed. The chat will be closed.
tooltips.putBackIntoQueue: Return this request to the main queue for review. It will not progress until someone else picks it up.
tooltips.placeOnHold: Temporarily hold the request without completing it. It will be removed from the queue but can be resumed later. Typically used for requests that need more information from the user.

loginUser.heading: Enter Your Reference Code
loginUser.description: Paste the code you received after submitting your request to view its status and messages.

home.description: Not sure if you've picked liberty caps? Submit a free and anonymous request here:

membership.title: Become a Member ‚Äì Support Soppidentifikasjon.no!
membership.intro: Would you like to help keep Soppidentifikasjon.no running and assist others with safe mushroom picking? As a member, you support our work in covering operational costs and compensating our mushroom experts.
membership.why1: üå± Support the platform: Help maintain the website and keep our identification service free.
membership.why2: üçÑ Learn about mushrooms: Gain access to exclusive content on mushroom identification, edible species, and lookalikes.
membership.why3: üßê Become an expert: Members can apply to join our team of mushroom experts and assist others in safe identification.
membership.type1: üíõ Supporter: Contribute financially and get access to exclusive member content.
membership.type2: üî¨ Expert Member: For those with experience and knowledge, willing to identify mushrooms for our users.
membership.closing: Together, we make mushroom identification safer for everyone! Become a member today and support our mission.

support.title: Need help?
support.intro: Here you‚Äôll find answers to common questions and how to contact us.

faq1.question: How does the mushroom identification service work?
faq1.answer: You upload photos and receive a response within 1‚Äì2 days.

faq2.question: How do I use my reference code?
faq2.rest: and enter the code you received.

faq3.question: Can I request a new evaluation?
faq3.answer: Yes, upload new photos and submit a new request.

errors.invalidPasswordFormat: Password must be 8‚Äì50 characters long, include one uppercase letter, one number, and contain no spaces.

errors.failedToLoadProfile: Failed to load your profile information.

basketBadge.TOXIC_MUSHROOM_PRESENT: Warning: This basket contains at least one toxic mushroom
basketBadge.UNIDENTIFIABLE_MUSHROOM_PRESENT: Some mushrooms in this basket could not be identified
basketBadge.ALL_MUSHROOMS_PROCESSED: All mushrooms in this basket have been processed
basketBadge.NO_MUSHROOMS_PROCESSED: None of the mushrooms have been processed yet

basketBadge.ALL_MUSHROOMS_ARE_UNIDENTIFIABLE: None of the mushrooms in this basket could be identified
